alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 10:49PM AKST until January 17 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...MODERATE SNOW EXPECTED ALONG HAINES HIGHWAY... .Frontal band spreading north is bringing overrunning moisture over the colder air trapped in the Chilkat Valley and along the Haines Highway. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 PM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Haines Highway, lower amounts near Haines downtown. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 PM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Be prepared for winter driving and carry a winter survival kit if possible. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
